name: Security Guidance
description: Security reminder hook that warns about potential security issues when editing files, including command injection, XSS, and unsafe code patterns
longDescription: Installs a Python-based post-tool-use hook that scans file edits for 9 vulnerability patterns: GitHub Actions workflow injection, child_process command injection, dynamic Function() creation, eval(), React dangerouslySetInnerHTML XSS, document.write DOM XSS, innerHTML XSS, Python pickle deserialization, and os.system() injection. Warns on detection without blocking, acting as a passive safety net.
